[ACT](VC)[Limit-Break 4](This ability is active if you have four or more damage):[Counter-Blast 2] Look at the top card of your deck, search for up to one <Gold Paladin> from among them, call it to an open (RC), put the rest on the bottom of your deck, and increase this unit's [Power] ã€€by the original [Power] of the unit called with this effect until end of turn.
[CONT](VC):During your turn, this unit gets [Power] +1000 for each of your <Gold Paladin> rear-guards.

name: Player of the Holy Bow, Viviane
effect: [AUTO](VC)/(RC):[Counter-Blast 1] When this unit's attack hits a vanguard, if this unit is boosted ([Boost]) by a <Gold Paladin>, you may pay the cost, and if you do, look at the top card of your deck, search for up to one <Gold Paladin> from among them, call it to an open (RC), and put the rest on the bottom of your deck.

name: Dragonic Kaiser Vermillion
effect:
[ACT](VC)[Limit-Break 4](This ability is active if you have four or more damage):[Counter-Blast 3] Until end of turn, this unit gets [Power] +2000, and battles every unit in your opponent's front row in one attack.
[CONT](VC)/(RC):If you have a non-<Narukami> vanguard or rear-guard, this unit gets [Power] -2000.

name: Desert Gunner, Shiden
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC) or (RC), if you have a <Narukami> vanguard, choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and that unit cannot intercept ([Intercept]) until end of turn.
